author: pipermerriam
content: For any EL teams that want to get started on a portal implementation, our weekly implementation call is on Mondays at 1530 UTC and gets announces in the general channel in the Portal Network discord.  We will be hosting a Portal focused core dev event of some kind at Devcon and my hope is that EL teams that are planning to integrate with Portal will have someone who's already engaged with the development process by that time.  Having EL teams gain an understanding of the Portal protocol prior to Devcon will make this core dev event much more productive.
